block.p: The five most e-mailed articles from nytimes.com/sports for Jan. 20 to 26.
1. EXPERT TIES EX-PLAYER'S SUICIDE TO BRAIN DAMAGE -- Neuropathologist examines Andre Waters's brain. (Published Jan. 18)
2. UNEASY AT FIRST, METS EMBRACE THEIR NEW ORLEANS CONNECTION -- Mr. Met on Bourbon Street to promote the team's new Class AAA affiliate. (Jan. 19)
3. AN ALTERNATIVE TO LONG IRONS, AND IT'S LEGAL -- Hybrid golf clubs catching on with pros and average players. (Jan. 23)
4. BEARS COACH SMITH REFLECTS ON HIS ROOTS -- Colts Coach Tony Dungy blazed a trail for Lovie Smith. (Jan. 23)
5. WITH FIELD-GOAL ACCURACY ON THE RISE, ARE KICKERS TOO GOOD? At this rate, the N.F.L. may have to answer that question. (Jan. 21)
